description:
The VF-5000G is the standard, single seat variant of the Zolan Galactic Whale patrol unit. Easily identified in a teal hull with yellow highlights, the variable fighter is most often seen with the Super Booster optional space/atmospheric booster and engine/leg Super Parts. Typically, the VF-5000G variable fighters feature shock ordnance and a shock gun pod for decreased lethality in their primary role as patrol craft.
Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macross7/vf-5000g.htm
name: VF-5000G Star Mirage
